title: Fragments, 1978-168-14-a/c, 1750–99
medium:
Silk, velvet
Structure/technique: Cut loops of supplementary warps in a 3/1 twill foundation plus a continuous supplementary weft.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs
description: Fragments of velvet: Rows of tiny green and black dots of cut pile alternating with offset rows of tiny voided dots accented by floats of a supplementary weft on a rust red cut pile background.
